message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment that could potentially yield substantial returns. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I kindly propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while providing you with a favorable deal. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding your thoughts on this proposal. Thank you for considering this opportunity.
